patthana12.18:1.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.18:2.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.18:3.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.18:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.18:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.18:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.18:7.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.18:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.18:9.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana12.18:10.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana12.18:11.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana12.18:12.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
